mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_front_information (STRINFORMATIONID, STRCONTENT, STRINSERTTIME) VALUES (#{strInformationid}, #{strContent}, #{strInserttime})
mapper.select: SELECT STRINFORMATIONID AS strInformationid, STRCONTENT AS strContent, STRINSERTTIME AS strInserttime FROM tb_front_information ORDER BY STRINSERTTIME DESC LIMIT 1
